items.sentence: I\'ve already told Tom that he doesn\'t need to come here tomorrow.
We can\'t really be certain that Tom will get on the baseball team.
You should never take your eyes off the road while you\'re driving.
A good password should be difficult to guess, but easy to remember.
I assume you\'ve heard that we\'re having a meeting this afternoon.
I\'d really like to know why you didn\'t do what I asked you to do.
Tom rode a horse last week when he was at his grandfather\'s ranch.
Do you think that you could help me weed the garden this afternoon?
What makes you think that Tom is planning to ask Mary to marry him?
You speak French very well. I wish I could speak it as well as you.
